Posts.Content: Firstmate52 wrote: Looks like the machine is a tube like the MRI. I've read that the hole is bigger so not quite as claustrophobic. Is this true? Since they are looking at my abd/chest can I go in feet first? I do OK with things as long as my head is out/or if I can see out sideways like with the bone scan machine. I'm very worried about going head first into a tube. Very claustrophobic. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Scheduled for a PET scan and worried about clastrophobia Firstmate52 VivianS
